mapper.insert: insert into dr_sell_record (id, creation_date, lsh, mxh, dwt_sell_prescription_lsh, invoice_type_id, invoice_no, invoice_date, sys_sell_way_id, sys_sell_type_id, entity_type_id, entity_id, retail_price, actual_retail_price, purchase_tax_rate, sell_tax_rate, discountable, lossable, iym_inventory_id, ph, pch, split_quantity, quantity, cost_price, produced_date, expiry_date, pem_supplier_id, iym_inventory_add_id, mrm_member_id, member_discount_rate, sys_clinic_id, seller_id, operator_id, cashier_id, pay_state, returned ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwtSellPrescriptionLsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysSellWayId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysSellTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entityTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{retailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actualRetailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchaseTaxRate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sellTaxRate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{discountable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{lossable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{iymInventoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{splitQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{producedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{expiryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{pemSupplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iymInventoryAddId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mrmMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberDiscountRate,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sysClinicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cashierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payState,jdbcType=BIT}, #{returned,jdbcType=BIT} )
mapper.update: update dr_sell_record set creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lsh = #{lsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mxh = #{mxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dwt_sell_prescription_lsh = #{dwtSellPrescriptionLsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_type_id = #{invoiceTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invoice_no = #{invoiceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_date = #{invoiceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sys_sell_way_id = #{sysSellWayId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sys_sell_type_id = #{sysSellTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, entity_type_id = #{entityTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, entity_id = #{entityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, retail_price = #{retailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, actual_retail_price = #{actualRetailPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, purchase_tax_rate = #{purchaseTaxRate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sell_tax_rate = #{sellTaxRate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, discountable = #{discountable,jdbcType=BIT}, lossable = #{lossable,jdbcType=BIT}, iym_inventory_id = #{iymInventoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ph = #{ph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pch = #{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, split_quantity = #{splitQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, produced_date = #{producedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, expiry_date = #{expiryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, pem_supplier_id = #{pemSupplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, iym_inventory_add_id = #{iymInventoryAddId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mrm_member_id = #{mrmMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_discount_rate = #{memberDiscountRate,jdbcType=REAL}, sys_clinic_id = #{sysClinicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cashier_id = #{cashierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_state = #{payState,jdbcType=BIT}, returned = #{returned,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, creation_date, lsh, mxh, dwt_sell_prescription_lsh, invoice_type_id, invoice_no, invoice_date, sys_sell_way_id, sys_sell_type_id, entity_type_id, entity_id, retail_price, actual_retail_price, purchase_tax_rate, sell_tax_rate, discountable, lossable, iym_inventory_id, ph, pch, split_quantity, quantity, cost_price, produced_date, expiry_date, pem_supplier_id, iym_inventory_add_id, mrm_member_id, member_discount_rate, sys_clinic_id, seller_id, operator_id, cashier_id, pay_state, returned from dr_sell_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, creation_date, lsh, mxh, dwt_sell_prescription_lsh, invoice_type_id, invoice_no, invoice_date, sys_sell_way_id, sys_sell_type_id, entity_type_id, entity_id, retail_price, actual_retail_price, purchase_tax_rate, sell_tax_rate, discountable, lossable, iym_inventory_id, ph, pch, split_quantity, quantity, cost_price, produced_date, expiry_date, pem_supplier_id, iym_inventory_add_id, mrm_member_id, member_discount_rate, sys_clinic_id, seller_id, operator_id, cashier_id, pay_state, returned from dr_sell_record
mapper.update:
update dr_sell_record set returned = true where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
select * from view_dr_sell_record
(sysClinicId = #{sysClinicId}) and
(DATE_FORMAT(creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{creationDate[0]} and #{creationDate[1]}) and
(lsh like '${lsh}%') and
(sellerName like '${sellerName}%' or sellerCode like '${sellerName}%') and
order by creationDate desc, sysSellTypeId, entityTypeId, entityId

select creationDate, lsh, invoiceTypeName, invoiceNo, sysSellWayName, mrmMemberId, mrmMemberOid, mrmMemberName, phone, sysClinicName, cashierName, sum(quantity * actualRetailPrice) as totalSellAmount, sum(case when invoiceTypeId is not null then (quantity * actualRetailPrice) else 0 end) as totalInvoiceAmount from view_dr_sell_record
(sysClinicId = #{sysClinicId}) and
(DATE_FORMAT(creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{creationDate[0]} and #{creationDate[1]}) and
(lsh like '${lsh}%') and
(mrmMemberName like '${mrmMemberName}%' or mrmMemberCode like '${mrmMemberName}%' or phone like '${mrmMemberName}%') and
group by lsh order by creationDate desc
select * from view_dr_sell_record where (sysClinicId = #{sysClinicId}) and (lsh = #{lsh}) and (returned is false) order by sysSellTypeId, entityTypeId, entityId
select * from view_dr_sell_record where (sysClinicId = #{sysClinicId}) and (lsh = #{lsh}) order by sysSellTypeId, entityTypeId, entityId
